name: Mario Puzzle Wiki
short_description: Mario Puzzle Wiki is a challenging web based game in which you will be able to complete a series of twisting puzzles featuring Mario and Luigi. It has 100 levels of progresive difficulty, but new levels can be created and uploaded with the bundled editor
